sentence.Network_en: She had her own misfortunes to bewail as well as those of her daughter.
sentence.Network_cn: 她跟她女儿一样,也有她自己的苦经,需要哭诉一番.

sentence.Network_en: Carrion crows bewail the dead sheep and then eat them.
sentence.Network_cn: 乌鸦吃死羊,先要哭一场;猫哭老鼠假慈悲.

sentence.Network_en: The winds bewail the leafless tree.
sentence.Network_cn: 狂风为无叶的秃树哀悼几几.

list.abs: While he lamented and bewailed his sores and bruises , he cried loudly for help ., 当他在为他的伤口和擦伤遗憾和哀叹时 , 他大声喊救命.
bewail one ' s bad luck ., 悲叹自己的命苦.

list.abs: Poverty... ... stricken region 灾区; 灾区 to bewail one's poverty 哭穷; 哭穷 to lift oneself out of poverty 脱贫; 脱贫.

entry.def: If you bewail something, you express great sorrow about it.

example.ex: ...songs that bewail his dissatisfaction in love.
example.tran: 哀叹他爱情失意的歌曲

auth_sentence.content: Unhappy boater Leif Mills was not the only one to bewail the reduced space we devoted to Henley this year.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unhappy boater Leif Mills was not the only one to bewail the reduced space we devoted to Henley this year.
